contextId.information: Here "mighty" is plural and may refer to only Saul and Jonathan, or to all of the soldiers of Israel. AT: "the mighty warriors" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]])
Here "the blind" and "the lame" are nominal adjectives. AT: "those people who cannot see and those who cannot walk" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]])
This refers to someone who has died, not dead people in general. AT: "someone who has died" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_nominaladj]])
